showScoreExcerpt:
"A delightful new musical...This is a story about kindness and coming together, which feels like a balm in today's bitter, divided age...The music is fierce and lively and sometimes poignant. Director Christopher Ashley pulls the magic trick of keeping all the characters straight, as they whirl in and out of different characters. 'Come From Away' is a love letterâ€”to Newfoundland, to New York, to what people can do if they set aside fear and hate. Don't miss it."
